Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) has asked a senior QC to "comprehensively" re-examine material amassed as part of the original inquiry and any new evidence. In his resignation statement, Mr Andy Coulson said: Nothing is more important than the Government's task of getting this country back on its feet. "Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role. "I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on. Speaking to reporters later, Mr David Cameron said he had done an "excellent, excellent job" as his communications chief, and was being "punished for the same offence twice" following his earlier resignation
